title: [Bug]: Latin characters are not working on text input
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Yes

### Describe the bug

When I update version form 2.0.17 to 2.1.0 can't use characters like ãúó in textfields.

### What package are you using?

rpm

### Version

2.1.0

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. Update version to 2.1.0
2. New message to myself
3. Try to type " última maçã de órion " 

Actual Result: ultima maca de orion
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1. Update version to 2.1.0
2. New message to myself
3. Try to type " última maçã de órion " 

Expected: última maçã de órion
```

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
```

### Additional context

_No response_
